prompts.title: Winning Product Analysis: [product]
prompts.text: Act as a senior eCommerce strategist. Analyze [product] for the US market. Provide: target audience, primary use case, key competitors, differentiation angles, pricing band, seasonality, potential objections, refund risks, and a go/no-go recommendation with reasoning.

prompts.title: Offer + Positioning Blueprint: [product]
prompts.text: Create an irresistible offer for [product]. Include: core promise, unique mechanism, bundle ideas, bonuses, pricing strategy (3 tiers), risk reversal, urgency/scarcity ideas, and 5 headline options for ads and landing pages.

prompts.title: Product Page Copy (PDP) – Conversion Framework: [product]
prompts.text: Write a high-converting product page for [product]. Include: hero headline, subheadline, 7 benefit bullets, 5 feature bullets, 'how it works' section, social proof placeholders, FAQ (8 Q/A), shipping & returns copy, and 3 CTA variants. Tone: premium and trustworthy.

prompts.title: Ad Angles Brainstorm (15 angles): [product]
prompts.text: Brainstorm 15 distinct ad angles for [product]. For each angle include: hook line, pain point, unique benefit, proof idea, and CTA. Make angles non-repetitive (problem/solution, myth-bust, demo, comparison, social proof, scarcity, etc.).

prompts.title: Customer Avatar (ICP) Builder: [product]
prompts.text: Build a customer avatar for [product]. Provide demographics, psychographics, daily routines, purchase motivations, top fears/objections, desired outcomes, language they use, and a 60-second brand message tailored to them.

prompts.title: Post‑Purchase Email Flow (7 emails): [product]
prompts.text: Create a 7-email post-purchase flow for customers who bought [product]. Include: timing, subject lines, preview text, email goal, key talking points, cross-sell/up-sell idea, and a short email draft for each step.

prompts.title: Supplier + Logistics Due Diligence Checklist: [product]
prompts.text: Create a supplier due diligence checklist for sourcing [product]. Include: quality control questions, sample evaluation steps, certifications, packaging requirements, labeling compliance, shipping options, incoterms, expected defect rate, and a negotiation script for better pricing and MOQs.

prompts.title: Value Proposition Refinement: [offer]
prompts.text: Refine the value proposition for [offer]. Produce: one-liner, expanded positioning statement, 5 key benefits, 3 differentiators, and 10 headline variations. Include versions for: skeptical users, budget-conscious users, and premium buyers.

prompts.title: Landing Page Copy (AIDA + PAS): [offer]
prompts.text: Write landing page copy for [offer] using both AIDA and PAS frameworks. Include: hero section, problem section, solution section, benefits, features, objections, testimonials placeholders, FAQ, and final CTA. Keep it concise and conversion-focused.

prompts.title: Email Sequence (5 steps): [offer]
prompts.text: Create a 5-email sequence to promote [offer]. Provide: timing, subject lines, preview text, email goal, body copy (short), and CTA. Include one story email, one objection-handling email, and one scarcity email.

prompts.title: Ad Copy Variations (Meta/Google): [offer]
prompts.text: Generate ad copy for [offer]. Output: 10 primary texts, 10 headlines, 10 descriptions, 5 CTAs, and 5 audience targeting hypotheses. Keep each variation distinct and testable.

prompts.title: Objection Handling Matrix: [offer]
prompts.text: Create an objection-handling matrix for [offer]. List 12 common objections, the real underlying concern, best rebuttal, proof to add, and the safest CTA to use after addressing each objection.

prompts.title: Brand Voice Guide (1 page): [offer]
prompts.text: Create a one-page brand voice guide for [offer]. Include: voice adjectives, do/don’t rules, signature phrases, banned words, writing examples (email, ad, landing page, customer support), and tone adjustments for complaints vs praise.

prompts.title: A/B Testing Plan (14 days): [offer]
prompts.text: Design a 14-day A/B testing plan for [offer]. Include: hypothesis, primary KPI, test prioritization, sample sizing approach, test schedule, creative variations, landing page variables, and decision rules to stop/scale tests.

prompts.title: 30-Day Content Plan: [niche]
prompts.text: Create a 30-day YouTube content plan for the niche: [niche]. Provide: 12 long-form video ideas, 18 Shorts ideas, target viewer, hook promise, and how each idea ties into a series for binge-watching.

prompts.title: High-Retention Script Outline: [niche]
prompts.text: Write a high-retention script outline for a YouTube video in the niche [niche]. Include: hook (0–15s), open loop, value bullets, pattern interrupts every 20–30s, mid-video re-hook, and closing CTA without sounding salesy.

prompts.title: Titles + Thumbnails (20 pairs): [niche]
prompts.text: Generate 20 title + thumbnail concept pairs for [niche]. For each pair include: title, thumbnail text (max 4 words), visual composition, and the curiosity gap being leveraged.

prompts.title: Shorts Repurposing System: [niche]
prompts.text: Build a Shorts repurposing system for [niche]. Provide: editing template, hook formulas, caption style, b-roll suggestions, posting cadence, and a tracking sheet structure (metrics + decisions).

prompts.title: YouTube SEO Pack: [niche]
prompts.text: Create a YouTube SEO pack for [niche]. Output: 15 keyword phrases, an optimized description template, 20 tags, 5 pinned comment ideas, and chapter outline recommendations.

prompts.title: Audience Growth Strategy: [niche]
prompts.text: Design an audience growth strategy for [niche]. Include: positioning, upload schedule, series strategy, collaboration ideas, community post plan, and 10 experiments to run in the next 30 days.

prompts.title: Retention Diagnostics + Fixes: [niche]
prompts.text: Assume my YouTube channel is in [niche]. Create a retention diagnostics checklist (intro, pacing, clarity, storytelling, visuals, audio). Then propose 10 specific fixes and give examples of rewritten hooks.

prompts.title: Architecture Plan: [stack]
prompts.text: Act as a senior engineer. Propose a production architecture for a project using [stack]. Include: modules, data flow, deployment approach, env configuration, secrets management, error handling, logging, monitoring, and scaling considerations.

prompts.title: API Design Review Checklist: [stack]
prompts.text: Review an API design for [stack]. Provide best practices for: authentication, authorization, rate limiting, pagination, filtering, sorting, validation, error format, versioning, idempotency, and security headers.

prompts.title: Debug & Triage Plan: [stack]
prompts.text: Create a systematic debug plan for an issue in [stack]. Include: reproduction steps, logging strategy, isolation approach, hypotheses, metrics to inspect, rollback plan, and how to write a post-mortem.

prompts.title: Performance Optimization Plan: [stack]
prompts.text: Provide a performance optimization plan for [stack]. Cover: profiling tools, database indexing, caching strategy, payload reduction, N+1 fixes, async jobs, CDN usage, and performance budgets.

prompts.title: Security Hardening Checklist: [stack]
prompts.text: Create a security hardening checklist for [stack]. Include: input validation, XSS/CSRF, auth/session handling, secrets, dependency scanning, SSRF, file upload security, logging sensitive data, and secure headers.

prompts.title: Testing Strategy: [stack]
prompts.text: Design a testing strategy for [stack]. Include: unit, integration, contract, end-to-end tests; test data management; mocking guidelines; CI pipeline steps; and coverage goals with realistic tradeoffs.

prompts.title: Refactor Plan (Safe + Incremental): [stack]
prompts.text: Write an incremental refactor plan for a legacy codebase in [stack]. Include: risk assessment, strangler pattern options, feature flags, regression test plan, milestone breakdown, and measurable success criteria.

prompts.title: Creative Brief Generator: [project]
prompts.text: Write a professional creative brief for [project]. Include: background, goals, target audience, message hierarchy, tone, constraints, deliverables, timeline, and acceptance criteria.

prompts.title: Brand Identity System Outline: [project]
prompts.text: Create a brand identity system outline for [project]. Provide: brand values, personality, color palette rationale, typography pairing, imagery direction, icon style, and 10 practical usage examples.

prompts.title: UI Critique (Heuristics + UX): [project]
prompts.text: Critique [project] using usability heuristics. Provide: top 10 issues, severity, user impact, and recommended fixes. Include accessibility notes (contrast, focus states, motion).

prompts.title: Design System Starter (Tokens + Components): [project]
prompts.text: Create a starter design system for [project]. Include: spacing scale, typography scale, color tokens (light/dark), component list, states, and naming conventions for engineers/designers.

prompts.title: Ad Creative Concepts (10): [project]
prompts.text: Generate 10 ad creative concepts for [project]. For each: headline, visual concept, supporting copy, CTA, and why it will work psychologically.

prompts.title: Pitch Deck Structure + Copy: [project]
prompts.text: Create a pitch deck structure for [project]. Provide slide-by-slide titles, key bullets, and short speaker notes. Keep it crisp and investor-friendly.

prompts.title: Brand Guidelines (One Page): [project]
prompts.text: Write a one-page brand guidelines document for [project]. Include: logo usage rules, spacing, minimum sizes, color usage, typography rules, imagery do/don’t, and brand voice summary.

prompts.title: OKRs Drafting: [scenario]
prompts.text: Draft OKRs for [scenario]. Provide 1 objective and 4 measurable key results, plus initiatives and weekly leading indicators. Ensure KR metrics are unambiguous and realistic.

prompts.title: Decision Memo (1–2 pages): [scenario]
prompts.text: Write a decision memo for [scenario]. Include: context, problem, options considered, recommended decision, pros/cons, risks, mitigation, timeline, owners, and success metrics.

prompts.title: SOP Builder: [scenario]
prompts.text: Create a step-by-step SOP for [scenario]. Include: purpose, scope, roles, tools, prerequisites, step list with checkpoints, quality control, and escalation paths.

prompts.title: Meeting Agenda + Notes Template: [scenario]
prompts.text: Create a meeting agenda and notes template for [scenario]. Include: goals, pre-reads, time-boxed agenda, decision log, action items format, and follow-up email draft.

prompts.title: KPI Dashboard Definition: [scenario]
prompts.text: Define a KPI dashboard for [scenario]. List core KPIs, definitions, formulas, data sources, update frequency, and how to interpret changes. Include 5 actionable alerts.

prompts.title: Prioritization Framework: [scenario]
prompts.text: Create a prioritization framework for [scenario]. Include scoring criteria (impact, effort, confidence, risk), a simple scoring table, and examples of how to rank 10 tasks.

prompts.title: Communication Plan: [scenario]
prompts.text: Build a communication plan for [scenario]. Include: stakeholders, channels, cadence, key messages, FAQ, and a short update template for weekly reporting.

prompts.title: Client Proposal (High-Converting): [service]
prompts.text: Write a client proposal for [service]. Include: summary, outcomes, scope, deliverables, timeline, assumptions, pricing options (3 tiers), risk management, and next steps. Keep it concise and professional.

prompts.title: Discovery Questions (Deep + Practical): [service]
prompts.text: Create a discovery questionnaire for [service]. Provide 25 questions grouped by goals, constraints, audience, brand, technical requirements, success metrics, and approvals.

prompts.title: Scope of Work (SOW) Template: [service]
prompts.text: Draft a scope of work for [service]. Include: scope, out-of-scope, milestones, acceptance criteria, revision policy, dependencies, and payment terms.

prompts.title: Pricing Strategy + Packaging: [service]
prompts.text: Create pricing packages for [service]. Provide: 3 packages, value-based justification, what to upsell, and how to present pricing to reduce negotiation.

prompts.title: Client Onboarding Checklist: [service]
prompts.text: Create a client onboarding checklist for [service]. Include: assets to collect, access requests, kickoff agenda, timeline alignment, communication norms, and first-week deliverables.

prompts.title: Boundary Setting + Communication Scripts: [service]
prompts.text: Write 10 professional scripts to set boundaries for [service] (scope creep, late payments, urgent requests, extra revisions, weekend messages). Keep tone firm but friendly.

prompts.title: Testimonial Request Sequence: [service]
prompts.text: Write a testimonial request sequence for [service]. Include: initial request message, follow-up, suggested questions, and a short LinkedIn recommendation template.

prompts.title: Workflow Design (Step-by-Step): [workflow]
prompts.text: Design an automation workflow for: [workflow]. Provide: trigger, data needed, tools involved, step sequence, branching logic, error handling, retries, and logging. Include a simple diagram description.

prompts.title: Integration Mapping + Data Schema: [workflow]
prompts.text: For [workflow], map integrations and define a minimal data schema. Provide: fields, types, validation rules, deduplication strategy, and an example payload.

prompts.title: Monitoring + Alerting Plan: [workflow]
prompts.text: Create a monitoring plan for [workflow]. Include: success metrics, failure modes, alert thresholds, escalation policy, and a weekly health report template.

prompts.title: Security & Privacy Review: [workflow]
prompts.text: Review [workflow] for security and privacy. Include: data classification, least privilege access, token storage, audit logs, PII handling, retention policy, and threat scenarios (abuse, leakage, spoofing).

prompts.title: Automation QA Checklist: [workflow]
prompts.text: Write a QA checklist for [workflow]. Include: test cases, edge cases, rate limits, idempotency, rollback, and how to validate data accuracy.

prompts.title: SOP for Running the Automation: [workflow]
prompts.text: Create an SOP to operate and maintain [workflow]. Include: daily checks, incident response steps, how to pause/resume, and a change management checklist.

prompts.title: Optimization Ideas (Reduce Cost + Improve Reliability): [workflow]
prompts.text: Provide 15 optimization ideas for [workflow] focusing on cost reduction, fewer failures, better observability, and faster execution.

prompts.title: Content Pillars + Hooks: [platform_topic]
prompts.text: Create 5 content pillars for [platform_topic]. For each pillar: target audience, message goal, and 10 hook examples. Keep hooks platform-native and punchy.

prompts.title: 30-Day Posting Calendar: [platform_topic]
prompts.text: Build a 30-day content calendar for [platform_topic]. Provide: daily post type, topic, angle, CTA, and what to measure. Include 4 weekly themes and repurposing notes.

prompts.title: Caption Generator (10): [platform_topic]
prompts.text: Write 10 captions for [platform_topic] with different tones: educational, story, controversial, humorous, minimalist, data-driven, behind-the-scenes, FAQ, testimonial, and challenge. Add CTAs.

prompts.title: Hashtag + Keyword Strategy: [platform_topic]
prompts.text: Create a hashtag/keyword strategy for [platform_topic]. Provide: 5 broad tags, 10 niche tags, 10 long-tail keywords, and rules for rotation and testing.

prompts.title: Community Engagement Playbook: [platform_topic]
prompts.text: Create a community engagement playbook for [platform_topic]. Include: daily routines, comment reply templates, community questions, and how to turn comments into content ideas.

prompts.title: DM Outreach (Warm + Ethical): [platform_topic]
prompts.text: Write ethical DM outreach scripts for [platform_topic]. Include: 3 openers, 3 follow-ups, qualification questions, and a soft CTA that avoids spammy language.

prompts.title: Analytics Review + Next Actions: [platform_topic]
prompts.text: Create an analytics review template for [platform_topic]. Include: weekly KPI definitions, how to diagnose underperformance, and a decision tree for what to try next.

prompts.title: Image Prompt (Product Shot): [style]
prompts.text: Generate an AI image prompt for a product photo in the style: [style]. Include: subject, composition, lighting, lens/angle, background, props, mood, and negative prompts. Output in a single copy-ready prompt.

prompts.title: Image Prompt (Brand Scene): [style]
prompts.text: Create a brand storytelling image prompt in the style: [style]. Include: scene description, color palette, typography notes (if any), camera details, and negative prompts. Make it suitable for a hero section.

prompts.title: Image Prompt (Character Design): [style]
prompts.text: Write a character design prompt in the style: [style]. Include: character backstory cues, clothing, facial expression, pose, environment, lighting, and negative prompts. Keep it consistent and detailed.

prompts.title: Image Prompt (Poster Layout): [style]
prompts.text: Create a poster layout prompt in the style: [style]. Include: layout grid, focal point, headline area, supporting text area, texture, and negative prompts. Make it print-ready aesthetic.

prompts.title: Image Prompt (Social Ad Creative): [style]
prompts.text: Generate a social ad creative prompt in the style: [style]. Include: composition for 1:1 and 9:16 variants, space for copy, visual hierarchy, and negative prompts.

prompts.title: Image Prompt (Background Pack): [style]
prompts.text: Create 10 background-only prompt variations in the style: [style]. Each should be suitable behind product cutouts and include negative prompts to avoid text/artifacts.

prompts.title: Image Prompt (Style Consistency Rules): [style]
prompts.text: Write a style-consistency guide for generating a coherent image set in the style: [style]. Include: fixed tokens, allowed variations, camera rules, color rules, and common failure fixes.

prompts.title: Storyboard (8 scenes): [video_concept]
prompts.text: Create an 8-scene storyboard for: [video_concept]. For each scene: duration, visual description, on-screen text, camera movement, and the purpose (hook, proof, CTA).

prompts.title: Shot List + Camera Notes: [video_concept]
prompts.text: Generate a detailed shot list for [video_concept]. Include: shot type, framing, movement, lighting notes, and what emotion/idea the shot communicates.

prompts.title: Voiceover Script (30–45s): [video_concept]
prompts.text: Write a 30–45 second voiceover script for [video_concept]. Include: hook, problem, solution, proof, and CTA. Keep it conversational and punchy.

prompts.title: Retention Editing Plan: [video_concept]
prompts.text: Create a retention-focused editing plan for [video_concept]. Include: pacing beats, pattern interrupts, text overlays, b-roll rules, sound design cues, and how to avoid dead air.

prompts.title: Caption + Subtitle Style Guide: [video_concept]
prompts.text: Create a subtitle/caption style guide for [video_concept]. Include: typography, animation style, placement, color rules, safe margins, and accessibility notes.

prompts.title: B-Roll Ideas Bank (25): [video_concept]
prompts.text: Generate 25 b-roll ideas for [video_concept]. Include: what to film, why it supports the story, and suggested transitions.

prompts.title: Hook Variations (20): [video_concept]
prompts.text: Write 20 unique hook variations for [video_concept]. Mix: curiosity hooks, contrarian hooks, problem-first, proof-first, and story hooks. Keep each under 12 words.

prompts.title: Keyword Cluster + Intent Map: [keyword]
prompts.text: Create a keyword cluster for: [keyword]. Provide: primary keyword, 15 supporting keywords, search intent for each (informational/commercial/transactional), and content type recommendations.

prompts.title: SEO Blog Outline (High Ranking): [keyword]
prompts.text: Create an SEO-optimized blog outline for [keyword]. Include: H1, H2/H3 structure, key talking points, examples, and a section designed for featured snippets.

prompts.title: On-Page Optimization Checklist: [keyword]
prompts.text: Provide an on-page SEO checklist for [keyword]. Include: title tag rules, meta description, headers, internal links, image alt text, schema ideas, and content depth requirements.

prompts.title: Meta Title + Description Pack (20): [keyword]
prompts.text: Generate 20 meta title options and 20 meta description options for [keyword]. Keep titles under 60 characters and descriptions under 155 characters. Avoid clickbait; prioritize clarity and intent match.

prompts.title: Internal Linking Plan: [keyword]
prompts.text: Create an internal linking plan for a site targeting [keyword]. Provide: hub page idea, spoke article ideas, anchor text variations, and linking rules to avoid cannibalization.

prompts.title: Content Refresh Strategy: [keyword]
prompts.text: Create a content refresh strategy for an existing article about [keyword]. Include: what to update, what to remove, how to improve E-E-A-T, new sections to add, and how to measure improvement.

prompts.title: FAQ + Schema Suggestions: [keyword]
prompts.text: Generate 12 FAQs for [keyword] and recommend schema markup types to add. Provide concise answers (2–3 sentences) optimized for quick parsing.
